original_title: My Life, My Story, My Tourette's!
overview: This is a biographical documentary about a real man with Tourette's Syndrome. It is a film about the enigmatic history of the disorder and deals with various topics concerning the issue including family dynamics. Daniel Ferron goes on a "Tour of Tourette's" to uncover the truth, spread awareness, and raise funds for this mysterious condition.
tagline: Discover the truth behind this mysterious condition.
title: My Life, My Story, My Tourette's!
